dao.name: CHK_ORDER_DT_ISEXIST
dao.statement: SELECT COUNT(*) AS order_dt_count FROM ORDER_DT WHERE ATHENA_ID = trim(:athena_id) AND trim(HOTEL_COD) = trim(:hotel_cod) AND ORDER_STA = 'N' AND CI_DAT >= to_date(trim(:belong_dat), 'YYYY/MM/DD') AND INSTR( CHARACTER_RMK, ''''|| trim(:character_cod) || '''' ) > 0 AND ROWNUM <= 1
